DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , single-arm , multicenter , observational registry ACE Reperfusion Catheters Penumbra System Europe . Consecutive patient present within 6 hour symptom onset acute ischemic stroke ( within internal carotid artery internal carotid terminus , middle cerebral - M1/M2 segment ) due anterior circulation large vessel occlusion ( LVO ) treat use ADAPT technique thrombo-aspiration first intention site routine practice .
DOC.brief_title: European Registry ACE Reperfusion Catheters Penumbra System Treatment Acute Ischemic Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , single-arm , multicenter , observational registry ACE Reperfusion Catheters Penumbra System Europe . Consecutive patient present within 6 hour symptom onset acute ischemic stroke ( within internal carotid artery internal carotid terminus , middle cerebral - M1/M2 segment ) due anterior circulation large vessel occlusion ( LVO ) treat use ADAPT technique thrombo-aspiration first intention site routine practice . The follow-up visit occur 24 hour , 7-10 day discharge , 30 day 90 day post-procedure review patient 's functional outcome , quality life , adverse event .
DOC.criteria: General inclusion criterion : From 18 year age Present symptom consistent acute ischemic stroke within 6 hour stroke symptom onset Arterial occlusion distal intracranial carotid artery ( ICA ICA terminus ) middle cerebral artery ( M1/M2 ) National Institute Health Stroke Scale ( NIHSS ) ≥ 2 Signed Informed Consent Form . Imaging inclusion criterion : • CT ASPECT score 6 10 ( > 6 ) accord MR DWI ASPECT score 5 10 ( > 5 ) . General exclusion criterion : Associated myocardial infarction severe infection ( endocarditis sepsis ) Laboratory evidence coagulation abnormality , International Normalized Ratio ( INR ) > 3.0 platelet count < 40 x109/L APTT > 50 sec Uncontrolled hypertension ( define systolic blood pressure > 185 mmHg diastolic blood pressure > 110 mmHg ) Baseline glucose < 2.7 > 22.2 mmol/L Prestroke mRS score > 2 Seizure onset stroke Arterial tortuosity would prevent device reach target vessel Time stroke symptom onset unknown Life expectancy le 90 day prior stroke onset Females pregnant lactate Known serious sensitivity radiographic contrast medium . Imaging exclusion criterion : CT/MRI evidence follow condition screen : Significant mass effect midline shift Evidence intracranial hemorrhage ( ICH ) , aneurysm , arteriovenous malformation ( AVM ) Angiographic evidence tandem extracranial occlusion arterial stenosis proximal occlusion require treatment prior thrombus removal . Moderate stenosis require treatment exclusion criterion . Angiographic evidence preexist arterial injury , carotid dissection , complete cervical carotid occlusion , vasculitis .
